Translations.Text: kondamn est those disbelieved Infan Israel lang David Jesus fil Mary. This ili disobeyed transgressed
Ili ne enjoin unu another el committing evil Miserable ja est ki ili did
Vi seg many da them allying those disbelieve! Miserable ja est ki their man send for their anim. DI est KOLER them consequently ILI abide forever retribution
Hav ili kred en DI prophet en ki revealed him herein ili ne befriended them! many da them est evil
Vi trov ke mav enemies believers est Jud idol worshipers. Vi trov ke closest popol friendship believers est those dir Ni est Christian This est ili hav priests monak them ili ne est arrogant
When ili auxd ki revealed messenger vi vid their okul inund kun larm as ili recognize truth therein ili dir Our Lord ni kred tial count us witnesses
Why ni ne kred en DI truth ven us esper our Lord admit us righteous popol
DI REKOMPENC them DIR this; LI admit them GXARDEN FLU streams Ili abide therein forever Such est rekompenc por des righteous
As por those disbelieve reject our revelations ili est dwellers Infer
